record.title: EXECUTIVE SESSION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to executive session to consider the following nominations: calendar Nos. 45 and 46; that the nominations be confirmed; that the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table; that the President be immediately notified of the Senate's action; and that the Senate then resume legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
